## What is «Break-Glass»

<hr class="hr-blue">

<br>

>Break-glass access refers to a procedure used in critical emergencies or
exceptional cases, when a user with insufficient access is granted elevated
access rights to bypass normal access controls. -- SSH Academy (ssh.com) [^bg]

![Break-Glass Key](/src/images/break-glass.png){width=30% fig-align="center" #fig-bg-key}

[^bg]: [What is Break-Glass Access?](https://www.ssh.com/academy/secrets-management/what-is-break-glass-access){target=_blank}

## Requirements

<hr class="hr-blue">

::: {auto-animate=true}
::: {.incremental}
- Keyless/Passwordless
- Based on well-known protocols
- Independent on PAM platform
- Server-side authorization
- Independent on shared account(s) (sharedless)
- Simple integration to exist infrastructure
- Short-lived access
- Critical component(s) rotation (?)
:::
:::
